QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_CoveringBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all occurrences of coverings applied to spaces.

QtoDef.Name: Width
QtoDef.Definition: The width of the object. Only given, if the object has constant thickness (prismatic).

QtoDef.Name: GrossArea
QtoDef.Definition:
Gross Area of the object. Openings, recesses, projections and cut-outs are not taken into account.
Sum of all gross areas of the covering facing the space.

QtoDef.Name: NetArea
QtoDef.Definition:
Total net area of the object. Openings, recesses and cut-outs are taken into account by subtraction, projections by addition.
Sum of all net areas of the covering facing the space.
